parts:
You are extracting UBX-RXM-MEASX from u-blox PDF manual pages.

This message has a FIXED header followed by a repeated satellite block.

**CRITICAL: Extract ALL these header fields (offsets 0-43):**

| Offset | Type | Name | Description |
|--------|------|------|-------------|
| 0 | U1 | version | Message version |
| 1 | U1[3] | reserved0 | Reserved |
| 4 | U4 | gpsTOW | GPS TOW (ms) |
| 8 | U4 | gloTOW | GLONASS TOW (ms) |
| 12 | U4 | bdsTOW | BeiDou TOW (ms) |
| 16 | U1[4] | reserved1 | Reserved |
| 20 | U4 | qzssTOW | QZSS TOW (ms) |
| 24 | U2 | gpsTOWAcc | GPS TOW accuracy |
| 26 | U2 | gloTOWAcc | GLONASS TOW accuracy |
| 28 | U2 | bdsTOWAcc | BeiDou TOW accuracy |
| 30 | U1[2] | reserved2 | Reserved |
| 32 | U2 | qzssTOWAcc | QZSS TOW accuracy |
| 34 | U1 | numSV | Number of satellites |
| 35 | X1 | flags | Flags bitfield |
| 36 | U1[8] | reserved3 | Reserved |

**IMPORTANT**: The TOW accuracy fields (gpsTOWAcc, gloTOWAcc, bdsTOWAcc, qzssTOWAcc) are U2 types at offsets 24, 26, 28, 32. Do NOT omit these fields.

The repeated satellite block starts at offset 44 with 24 bytes per satellite.

Return using ubx_message_extraction tool.

{
  "ubx_message": {
    "name": "UBX-RXM-MEASX",
    "class": "0x02",
    "id": "0x14",
    "description": "Satellite measurements for RRLP",
    "type": "Periodic/Polled",
    "payload_length_formula": "44 + 24*numSV",
    "fields": [
      {
        "offset": 0,
        "name": "version",
        "type": "U1",
        "description": "Message version, currently 0x01"
      },
      {
        "offset": 1,
        "name": "reserved0",
        "type": "U1[3]",
        "description": "Reserved"
      },
      {
        "offset": 4,
        "name": "gpsTOW",
        "type": "U4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "GPS measurement reference time"
      },
      {
        "offset": 8,
        "name": "gloTOW",
        "type": "U4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "GLONASS measurement reference time"
      },
      {
        "offset": 12,
        "name": "bdsTOW",
        "type": "U4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "BeiDou measurement reference time"
      },
      {
        "offset": 16,
        "name": "reserved1",
        "type": "U1[4]",
        "description": "Reserved"
      },
      {
        "offset": 20,
        "name": "qzssTOW",
        "type": "U4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "QZSS measurement reference time"
      },
      {
        "offset": 24,
        "name": "gpsTOWAcc",
        "type": "U2",
        "scaling": "2^-4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "GPS measurement reference time accuracy (Oxffff = > 4s)"
      },
      {
        "offset": 26,
        "name": "gloTOWAcc",
        "type": "U2",
        "scaling": "2^-4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "GLONASS measurement reference time accuracy (Oxffff = > 4s)"
      },
      {
        "offset": 28,
        "name": "bdsTOWAcc",
        "type": "U2",
        "scaling": "2^-4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "BeiDou measurement reference time accuracy (Oxffff = > 4s)"
      },
      {
        "offset": 30,
        "name": "reserved2",
        "type": "U1[2]",
        "description": "Reserved"
      },
      {
        "offset": 32,
        "name": "qzssTOWAcc",
        "type": "U2",
        "scaling": "2^-4",
        "unit": "ms",
        "description": "QZSS measurement reference time accuracy (Oxffff = > 4s)"
      },
      {
        "offset": 34,
        "name": "numSV",
        "type": "U1",
        "description": "Number of satellites in repeated block"
      },
      {
        "offset": 35,
        "name": "flags",
        "type": "U1",
        "description": "Flags",
        "bitfield": [
          {
            "name": "towSet",
            "bits": "0:1",
            "description": "TOW set (0 = no, 1 or 2 = yes)"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "offset": 36,
        "name": "reserved3",
        "type": "U1[8]",
        "description": "Reserved"
      }
    ],
    "repeated_block": {
      "num_elements_field": "numSV",
      "block_length": 24,
      "start_offset": 44,
      "fields": [
        {
          "offset": 44,
          "relative_offset": 0,
          "name": "gnssId",
          "type": "U1",
          "description": "GNSS ID (see Satellite Numbering)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 45,
          "relative_offset": 1,
          "name": "svId",
          "type": "U1",
          "description": "Satellite ID (see Satellite Numbering)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 46,
          "relative_offset": 2,
          "name": "CNo",
          "type": "U1",
          "description": "carrier noise ratio (0..63)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 47,
          "relative_offset": 3,
          "name": "mpathIndic",
          "type": "U1",
          "description": "multipath index (according to [1]) (0 = not measured, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 48,
          "relative_offset": 4,
          "name": "dopplerMS",
          "type": "I4",
          "scaling": "0.04",
          "unit": "m/s",
          "description": "Doppler measurement"
        },
        {
          "offset": 52,
          "relative_offset": 8,
          "name": "dopplerHz",
          "type": "I4",
          "scaling": "0.2",
          "unit": "Hz",
          "description": "Doppler measurement"
        },
        {
          "offset": 56,
          "relative_offset": 12,
          "name": "wholeChips",
          "type": "U2",
          "description": "whole value of the code phase measurement (0..1022 for GPS)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 58,
          "relative_offset": 14,
          "name": "fracChips",
          "type": "U2",
          "description": "fractional value of the code phase measurement (0..1023)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 60,
          "relative_offset": 16,
          "name": "codePhase",
          "type": "U4",
          "scaling": "2^-21",
          "unit": "ms",
          "description": "Code phase"
        },
        {
          "offset": 64,
          "relative_offset": 20,
          "name": "intCodePhase",
          "type": "U1",
          "unit": "ms",
          "description": "Integer (part of the) code phase"
        },
        {
          "offset": 65,
          "relative_offset": 21,
          "name": "pseuRangeRMSE_rr",
          "type": "U1",
          "description": "pseudorange RMS error index (according to [1]) (0..63)"
        },
        {
          "offset": 66,
          "relative_offset": 22,
          "name": "reserved5",
          "type": "U1[2]",
          "description": "Reserved"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

fields.name: numSV
fields.description: Number of satellites in repeated block

fields.name: mpathIndic
fields.description: multipath index (according to [1]) (0 = not measured, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high)

fields.name: wholeChips
fields.description: whole value of the code phase measurement (0..1022 for GPS)

fields.name: fracChips
fields.description: fractional value of the code phase measurement (0..1023)
